idea-plugin.name: Kala Collections
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin provides inspections for the 'Kala' collections library for Java.
Once you import the (recent version of) Kala-common library, this plugin will give you useful suggestions, such as method replacements, equivalent-but-efficient conversion, etc.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Only warn about View's size comparisons as the other cases may not cause performance issues.
  • Address the renaming from Buffer to MutableList in kala library.
  • Avoid warning new on array creation of tuples.
